scripts.start: npm run cross-env && jest --watch --config jest.config.js tests/**/*.test.js
scripts.start:array: npm run cross-env && jest --watch  --config jest.config.js tests/array/*.test.js
scripts.start:object: npm run cross-env && jest --watch  --config jest.config.js tests/object/*.test.js
scripts.start:mix: npm run cross-env && jest --watch  --config jest.config.js tests/mix/*.test.js
scripts.start:function: npm run cross-env && jest --watch  --config jest.config.js tests/function/*.test.js
